title: 2019–20 AEK Athens F.C. season
text:
The 2019–20 season was <a href="AEK%20Athens%20F.C.">AEK Athens</a>' 59th competitive season in the top flight of Greek <a href="association%20football">football</a>, 10th season in the <a href="Super%20League%20Greece">Super League 1</a>, and 96th year in existence as a <a href="football%20club">football club</a>. They also compete in the <a href="Greek%20Cup">Greek Cup</a> and in the <a href="UEFA%20Europa%20League">UEFA Europa League</a>. The season covers the period from 1 July 2019 to 12 September 2020.
